resources.string:
Your personal number identifier — a reliable protector against spam, fraud, and unwanted calls.

This application is a tool offering features and capabilities for identifying phone scammers:
• Description of common fraud schemes
• Recognition of phone scammers
• Search for number information

Use the application as a tool for safe communication!

Scammers call by phone and send voice messages pretending to be relatives or friends. They use special programs to change their voice.

What scammers say in such calls and audio messages:

  • Ask to borrow money;
  • Complain about being in a difficult situation and ask to transfer money;
  • Report on behalf of a police officer that a relative is in trouble. The same relative asks to urgently transfer a certain amount.
Enter the password to confirm account deletion.:
